module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update module set module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, father_id = #{fatherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from module
and module_name like concat('%','${moduleName}','%' )
